name: derma
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the skin; used to form nouns and adjectives: He is a Los Angeles dermasurgeon. a dermatophyte fungus (= one that grows on skin) See also
dermal
dermatitis
dermatologist
dermatology
More examplesFewer examplesWeinberg, a dermatoepidemiologist, said available evidence supports the benefits of sunscreen.He suffered from dermatomyositis, a rare skin disease.She went for a derma-peel at the instore spa.
